answers.answer: I don't know exactly how much it is. Maybe around 8 oz. You have 5 minutes to drink all of it. The first time I did it I had a lemon lime that reminded me of Sprite for the first few sips. Then it was just terrible. The 2nd time I had a fruit punch. It wasn't quite as bad as the 1st. Both times I felt nauseous afterwards. Apparently, that's normal. You just can't throw up or else you will have to start over. You do NOT want to do that.
When I had mine I got the orange one. It just tasted like flat orange soda but it wasn't that bad. Just make sure you keep it down so you don't have to start all over again!
It's not really all that bad I mean it taste gross but everyone has to do honestly lol I have to do it my next appt as well it's basically a really sugary drink to test for gestational diabetes
Honestly it's not that bad. .. I've had the orange and the red. ... you'll be fine :)
